oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Thompson Show - Series 1, Program 04
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Series 1, program 4 of a radio show hosted by Hank Thompson with his Brazos Valley Boys (including steel guitarist Lefty Nason, fiddler Wade Wood, and singer Billy Stewart), to promote Hank's songbook of his Capitol recordings (songbook commercials not included). Circa 1949.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Thompson; Brazos Valley Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Cousin Abner) -- Theme (Humpty Dumpty Heart) -- Opening statement (Hank Thompson) -- Swing Wide Your Gate Of Love (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Sally Gooden (Wade Wood fiddle, Brazos Valley Boys) -- Hank Thompson talks -- I Find You Cheatin' On Me (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Hank Thompson talks -- Sugarfoot Rag (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Steel Guitar Rag (Lefty Nason steel guitar, Brazos Valley Boys) -- Hank Thompson talks -- Life's Railway To Heaven (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Closing statement (Hank Thompson) -- Theme (Humpty Dumpty Heart)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Thompson, Hank; Brazos Valley Boys; Wood, Wade; Nason, Lefty; Stewart, Billy (Bassist)
